0:
--------------------
Text: The Treaty of Springwells was an agreement between the United States and the Wyandot, Delaware, Seneca, Shawnee, Miami, Chippewa, Ottawa, and Potawatomi Indians, ending the conflict between the U.S. and these Indians that was part of the War of 1812.

Triplets:<The Treaty of Springwells
1:
--------------------
<Text: Treaty of Springwells:  It was signed on September 8, 1815, at the present site of the Fort Wayne historical site in Detroit, Michigan.>
Triplets:<Treaty of Springwells
